Row.Text: Direct the Mystics to Cast a Rune of Paralysis

The Henges have many uses: religious ceremonies, astronomical readings, and, most importantly, providing a prana-rich stage for magecraft. If you have your mystics on standby in the Henges, you may direct them to cast a powerful Rune of Paralysis to stop your foes dead in their tracks.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Ireland [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 1 Rune Henge with a Missionary stationed on it [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have enemy Units in your territory [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per Era [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith (increases with Era) [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All enemy Units within 1 tile of a Rune Henge with a Missionary stationed on it will be unable to move next turn, and will have -25% [ICON_STRENGTH] Defense this turn.

Modernize the Fianna and Make a Record of their Tales

The Fianna have been one of the toughest bands of warriors the world has yet seen, but at the same time, also amongst the most well-read and creative. While their methods are becoming obsolete, their tales should never die. By immortalizing their exploits, you can modernize them into a more fitting army while still retaining their storied reputations.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Ireland [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have discovered Steel [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least one Fianna [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must not have a resource deficit in [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have an unused Great Writer [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. This cost scales with the number of Fianna you currently own.
